full_summary:
### Government Contract: M20 Room 211 Office Fit-Up

#### Contract Overview

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for a general office renovation project, specifically targeting the second-floor office space in Building M-20 at the NRC's Montreal Road Campus.

#### Tender Details

* Contract Number: 24-58034
* Tender Closing Date: June 26, 2024, 14:00
* Evaluation Criteria:
	1. Technical score (40%)
	2. Tendered amount (60%)
* Evaluation Method:
	1. Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* Mandatory Requirements:
	1. A minimum of 10 years' experience in general contracting services
	2. Proof of membership in a recognized general contractor association in Ontario
	3. Providing a construction schedule for the project

#### Essential Documents

Please refer to the technical specifications for detailed information.

The complete package can be found [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39014/24-58034---tender-package---english.pdf).

#### Mandatory Security Requirements

The following security requirements MUST be met:

* The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD).
* All personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid Reliability Status granted or approved by CISD.
* The contractor must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual.

#### Evaluation Process

The submissions will be evaluated and notifies of individual results will be sent by email to all contractors who submitted a tender.

#### Addressing Questions

All questions related to this project must be addressed to and answered only by the Departmental Representative or the Contracting Authority.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

Attendance at a mandatory site visit is a requirement for all interested proponents. The visit will take place on June 5th and June 6th, 2024 at 10:30 am. Please note that failure to attend and sign the attendance form will result in disqualification.

#### Additional Information

Please refer to the link below for any additional information or to obtain the comprehensive tender package.

[More Information](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39014/24-58034---tender-package---english.pdf)
